name: Fish&Chips
description:
Go on a nice fishing trip with your fish buddy!

Communicate to find the best spots for fishing, catch as many fish as possible and enjoy a relaxing day on the lake!

==========

Fish Player Controls:

Left JoystickMovementYEmerge from WaterBPersuade other Fish

Fisher Player Controls:

Left JoystickMovementRight JoystickAim with rodRight TriggerThrow/Reel rod inBFeed Fish with Power-Up

===========
